author: Hakeem Irfan Rashid
title: COVID-19, case number 29: A broken family, A lonely funeral and ailing healthcare in Kashmir
description: On March 28, two brothers, wearing no protective gear, dragged their 62-year-old ailing father declared COVID-19 positive, uphill, on a damaged trolley, towards a ward at Chest Disease hospital, located on a hillock in Dalgate area of Srinagar.
content:
Srinagar: On March 28, two brothers, wearing no protective gear, dragged their 62-year-old ailing father declared COVID-19 positive, uphill, on a damaged trolley, towards a ward at Chest Disease hospital, located on a hillock in Dalgate area of Srinagar.
